articles.title: Upcoming Events in March 2024
articles.content:
A comprehensive guide to all League of Legends events happening in March 2024.

Event Schedule:
- MSI Qualifiers
- Community Tournaments
- In-game Events
- Special Promotions

Mark your calendar for these exciting events!
articles.summary: Your complete guide to all League of Legends events and tournaments happening in March 2024.

articles.title: New Champion: Briar's First Week
articles.content:
After one week in the Rift, Briar has made quite an impact on the meta.

With a 54% win rate in high ELO play, Briar is dominating the jungle position. Most players are building her with a combination of bruiser and assassin items, maximizing her unique blood rage mechanics.

Riot is already considering some minor nerfs for the upcoming patch to bring her more in line with other junglers.
articles.summary: Analysis of Briar's first week statistics and impact on the current meta.

articles.title: Patch 14.6 Notes: Complete Breakdown
articles.content:
Patch 14.6 brings several significant changes to League of Legends.

Champion Updates:
- Aatrox: Base AD reduced, Q damage nerfed
- Yasuo: Wind Wall cooldown increased
- Yuumi: Healing increased on her E
- Zed: Shadow cooldown reduced at later levels

Item Changes:
- Eclipse: Lethality reduced
- Goredrinker: Health increased

System Changes:
- Dragon soul buffs adjusted
- Baron buff duration increased
articles.summary: Full breakdown of everything changing in patch 14.6, from champion balance to item adjustments.

articles.title: T1 vs. GenG: Match of the Year
articles.content:
In what might be the most anticipated match of the LCK Spring Split, T1 faced off against GenG in an epic five-game series.

Faker pulled out surprise picks in both games 3 and 5, catching GenG completely off guard. Meanwhile, Chovy showed why he's considered one of the best mid laners with his incredible performance on Akali.

The series culminated in a nail-biting 45-minute final game that had fans on the edge of their seats.

T1 eventually secured the victory and strengthened their position at the top of the standings.
articles.summary: Recap of the intense five-game series between T1 and GenG in the LCK Spring Split.

articles.title: Dev Blog: The Future of League's Technology
articles.content:
Riot's engineering team has shared insights on upcoming technical improvements to League of Legends.

Key highlights:

1. New Game Engine: We're transitioning to a more modern engine that will support better graphics and physics

2. Improved Netcode: Reduced latency and better prediction systems are coming in 2024

3. Anti-cheat Updates: New systems to detect and prevent cheating

4. Performance Optimization: Targeting lower-end systems to ensure League remains accessible

These changes will be gradually rolled out over the next year, with the first improvements coming as soon as next patch.
articles.summary: Riot's engineering team details upcoming technical improvements to League of Legends' engine, netcode, and more.
